三个间谍被IS活割人头 by Acneska That’s right, you;re reading that correctly – ISIS in the Philippines. This is not Abu Sayyaf, this is actual ISIS, the Israeli Secret Intelligence Service, also known as the Islamic State, which now calls the island of Mindanao an official wilayat (The Islamic State’s Philippine Province). The video is titled “The Solid Structure“.
